definitions.totalRevenue: Total Revenue generated from orders within the selected period.
definitions.totalOrders: Total number of orders placed within the selected period.
definitions.totalClubMemberships: Total number of new club memberships acquired within the selected period.
definitions.wineBottleConversionRate: Percentage of orders that resulted in a new club membership, specifically for wine bottle purchases.
definitions.clubConversionRate: Percentage of orders that resulted in a new club membership, regardless of product type.

strengths: Strong revenue growth in Q1 2025 (28.66% increase)
Significant increase in bottles sold across all quarters
Improved club conversion rate in Q1 2025 (7.39% vs 3.7% previous year)
opportunities: Increase focus on club memberships in Q2 and Q3 to meet goals
Optimize dining experiences to improve conversion rates
Leverage successful retail conversion rates to boost overall performance
weaknesses: Declining guest numbers in Q1 and Q3 compared to previous year
Lower wine bottle conversion rates in Q1 compared to previous year
Decrease in average order value in Q3 2025
threats: Declining club conversion rates in Q2 and Q3 compared to goals

staffPraise.name: Benjamin Barnes
staffPraise.reason: Steady performance and improvement in Q3

staffCoaching.name: Jennifer O'Toole
staffCoaching.reason: Low club conversion rate in Q3 2025

staffCoaching.name: Liam Garvey
staffCoaching.reason: Below average wine bottle conversion rate in Q3 2025

recommendations: Implement targeted training to improve club conversion rates across all staff
Analyze successful retail strategies and apply insights to other service types
Develop initiatives to increase guest numbers, particularly in Q1 and Q3
